# animatedValueType

**Instance Property**

The type for the value that the action modifies over time.

## Declaration

```swift
let animatedValueType: (any AnimatableData.Type)?
```

## Discussion

Set to `nil` for an action that doesn’t modify a value.
title: animatedValueType
